1111000101100111 1000110111101001 1 -> sum: 0111111101010001, cout: 1
0101101101111011 1010011101110010 1 -> sum: 0000001011101110, cout: 1
1100100110111100 1011100110010100 1 -> sum: 1000001101010001, cout: 1
1001000000100000 0000011101000000 0 -> sum: 1001011101100000, cout: 0
1001100110100101 0011100101010011 0 -> sum: 1101001011111000, cout: 0
1011111000010010 0011111010011010 0 -> sum: 1111110010101100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
